nodes.text: The PW-3 ST Sniper Rifle was a model of blaster sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The PW-3 ST Sniper Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack, which was released on July 22, 2015.
